ROOT.GetTingDianData1: select acttype,line_id,l.longitude_sta,l.latitude_sta,l.longitude_tower,l.latitude_tower from "JC_DB"."VW_KV_MAINLINE_TJ_ALL_MAP_NEW" a left join same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameysh_line_info l on a.line_id=l.id where a.on_time is null and a.line_id!='_' AND a.VOLNAME IN ('220kV','500kV','110kV','35kV') and not exists(select 1 from "JC_DB"."VW_KV_MAINLINE_TJ_ALL_MAP_NEW" where line_id=a.line_id and rdfid<a.rdfid)
ROOT.GetTingDianData: select acttype,line_id,l.longitude_sta,l.latitude_sta,l.longitude_tower,l.latitude_tower from "JC_DB"."VW_KV_MAINLINE_TJ_ALL_MAP_NEW" a left join same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameysh_line_info l on a.line_id=l.id where a.on_time is null and a.line_id!='_' AND a.VOLNAME IN ('220kV','500kV','110kV','35kV') and not exists(select 1 from "JC_DB"."VW_KV_MAINLINE_TJ_ALL_MAP_NEW" where line_id=a.line_id and rdfid<a.rdfid)
ROOT.GetLineEndID: select e.id from sg_datacenter.sg_dev_aclineend_b e join sg_datacenter.sg_dev_acline_b l on e.line_id=l.id and e.st_id=l.start_st_id where l.id={0}
ROOT.GroupByVoltage: SELECT VOLNAME name,COUNT(1) AS C FROM "JC_DB"."VW_KV_MAINLINE_TJ_ALL_MAP_NEW" WHERE ON_TIME IS NULL AND VOLNAME IN ('220kV','500kV','110kV','35kV') GROUP BY VOLNAME ORDER BY LENGTH(VOLNAME) DESC,VOLNAME DESC
ROOT.GroupByOrgName: SELECT ORGNAME name,COUNT(1) AS value FROM "JC_DB"."VW_KV_MAINLINE_TJ_ALL_MAP_NEW" WHERE ON_TIME IS NULL AND VOLNAME IN ('220kV','500kV','110kV','35kV') GROUP BY ORGNAME
ROOT.GetAllDetail: SELECT OFF_TIME,ACTTYPE,LINE_ID,LINE_NAME,ORGNAME,SUBORG_NAME,VOLNAME,SUB_ID,SUBNAME FROM "JC_DB"."VW_KV_MAINLINE_TJ_ALL_MAP_NEW" WHERE ON_TIME IS NULL AND VOLNAME IN ('220kV','500kV','110kV','35kV') ORDER BY LENGTH(VOLNAME) DESC,VOLNAME DESC, OFF_TIME
ROOT.GetVoltageDetail: SELECT OFF_TIME,ACTTYPE,LINE_ID,LINE_NAME,ORGNAME,SUBORG_NAME,VOLNAME,SUB_ID,SUBNAME FROM "JC_DB"."VW_KV_MAINLINE_TJ_ALL_MAP_NEW" WHERE ON_TIME IS NULL AND VOLNAME={1} ORDER BY OFF_TIME
ROOT.GetOrgDetail: SELECT OFF_TIME,ACTTYPE,LINE_ID,LINE_NAME,ORGNAME,SUBORG_NAME,VOLNAME,SUB_ID,SUBNAME FROM "JC_DB"."VW_KV_MAINLINE_TJ_ALL_MAP_NEW" WHERE ON_TIME IS NULL AND ORGNAME={1} AND VOLNAME IN ('220kV','500kV','110kV','35kV') ORDER BY LENGTH(VOLNAME) DESC,VOLNAME DESC, OFF_TIME
